channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Predictive Forecasting Is The Future Of AI
item.description: It is an often-overlooked area of AI that has been highly valuable for business process optimization and operational efficiency at scale.
